caption.title: Comparison of parameter estimation under constant/time-varying transmissibility.
caption.p: The lines with circles “○” are the estimate under the situation of constant transmissibility, and the shaded area denote the 95% confidence interval from 100 simulations. The lines with triangles “▽” are the estimates under the situation with time-varying transmissibility (TVT). The comparison is performed under the situation of R 0 = 2.5 and the heterogeneity ( CV λ) varies from 0 to 5. Sample size n = 100 and simulation runs = 100.
Click here for additional data file.
